definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: flat plate, pan, or griddle for baking, only P and late; abs. ´[[מ]] Le 2:5 + 2 t.; [[מַחֲבַָת]] Le 7:9; cstr. [[מַחֲבַת]] Ez Eze 4:3; —
used in preparing the (baken) mincha, preceded by [[עַל־]] Le 2:5, Le 6:14, Le 7:9 (all P), cf. 1Ch 23:29.
[[בַּרְזֶל]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 4:3 a plate of iron, signifying an iron wall, in prediction of siege of city.
